name: Cybernetic Rave
description:
Take your creativity to new heights with over 410+ files featuring melodic synths, harmonic vocals, powerful drums, strong percussions, distinct atmosphere and more! One listen and you will be hooked, Cybernetic Rave has everything you need to help create your next music production & tracks. 

  • 324 audio files
  • 89 midi files
  • 160 loops
  • 164 one shots
  • 458.6 MB of loops & one shots
Epic Stock Media · Cybernetic Rave - Loops Midi & One Shot Library

Bring the 90s back with some flair! 

Why stick with a single genre? Cybernetic Rave encompasses styles ranging from beat-less ambient music to hardcore, with house music, techno, drum and bass, dubstep and trance, among the most-notable examples. There is no shortage of options in the Cybernetic Rave, inside you will find production ready loops & one shots that will bring your project to the next level. 

Everything is organized into understandable folders & meticulously form, bpm and key tagged. We’ve added Sound-miner metadata into the samples to help you find the right sound at the right time. All files are Royalty-Free and supplied to you in high quality 24-Bit .wav audio file format and can be used in the most popular samplers, DAWs, and plugins with drag & drop plugin features. 

Product details:

  • 413 total files
  • 160 loops
  • 164 one shots
  • 89 midi files
  • 458.6 MB of loops & one shots
  • All in high-quality 48k/24-Bit WAV 
  • 25+ minutes of sound
  • 100% royalty-free
  • Embedded with soundminer metadata
  • 10 Atmosphere loops
  • 20 Bass loops
  • 60 Drum loops
  • 70 Melodic loops
  • 15 Bass one shots
  • 110 Drum one shots- claps, crashes, hi-hats, kicks, percussion, rides and snares
  • 124 Synth one shots
  • 15 Vocal one shots bass one shots
  • All files form, key, & bpm labeled
  • Compatible with PC/Mac and all DAW’s
